name: Master PDF Editor
description: Master PDF Editor is a powerful PDF and XPS document editing tool. It can help you view and edit PDF and XPS documents, supports to import / export them to JPG, TIFF, PNG or BMP format. Meanwhile, for common PDF reading demand, such as annotation adding and highlighting are also well supported.

en_US.description: Master PDF Editor is a powerful PDF and XPS document editing tool. It can help you view and edit PDF and XPS documents, supports to import / export them to JPG, TIFF, PNG or BMP format. Meanwhile, for common PDF reading demand, such as annotation adding and highlighting are also well supported.
en_US.name: Master PDF Editor

zh_CN.description: Master PDF Editor是一款功能强大的PDF和XPS文档编辑工具，它可以帮助您查看和编辑PDF和XPS文档。Master PDF Editor支持PDF和XPS文件导入/导出到JPG、 TIFF、 PNG或BMP格式。同时，对于常见的PDF阅读需求，如添加注释、高亮显示等也能很好的支持。
zh_CN.name: Master PDF Editor
